description.@en: As you touch one of the undead, they instantly disintegrate into dust, forever destroyed

data.distance: Any one person you can touch

criticalFailure.@en: The stake splinters in-hand and the very Supernatural creature you intended to drive it into, is reinvigorated with ‘unlife’. The Supernatural creature is instantly restored to Unhindered, Unharmed and loses all Injuries.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foe cannot Resist this Magick.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch (providing they are classified as a Supernatural creature) must Resist with a successful Coordination Test or be Slain!. If they fail, they are turned entirely to dust, and cannot be raised from the dead.

reagents.@en: A stake carved from rare ironwood, driven into the unliving (expended)
